entry.title: New release for LinkBuddy: LinkBuddy v1.1.1
entry.content:
• Release of the Android version.
  • Updates verbiage on alert during delete/update/add when loss connection to a server.
  • Updates expo/react components to latest supported versions and for cross-platform mobile build.

entry.title: New release for LinkBuddy: LinkBuddy v1.2.0
entry.content:
• Updates tagging interface with pull to refresh and lazy loading.
  • Updates bookmark creation with new modal tagging ui that will suggest existing tags or the ability to create a new one from modal.
  • Adds ability to create a new tag in separate screen.

entry.title: New release for LinkBuddy: LinkBuddy v1.3.0
entry.content:
• Adds long press gesture for sharing URL.
  • Adds AddLink button on all list screens.
  • Displays tags on each link (only up to what can fit on the screen width) that are also pressable to bring up all links with the specific tag.

entry.title: New release for LinkBuddy: LinkBuddy v1.3.2
entry.content:
• Fixes some formatting issues on certain devices, commit 7084b013f8eae3335e6469d977eb4c24be01d8a0
  • Updates header on tag selection from bookmark lists pages to show hashtag selected tag, commit 812d3557f5f5c25076b2e7c2e601109078c6e4d9
  • Removes some placeholder borders that would show when light mode on enabled, commit 30f647f02f5a8c14d73f95d4f047c31ac0fbf109
